name: googledoc-extract-images
description: Извлекает все изображения из гугл-дока и нумерует их в порядке очередности

scripts.lin-package: cd build; rm -r googledoc-extract-images; cp -r googledoc-extract-images-linux-x64 googledoc-extract-images; 7z a -ssw -mx5 -spf -r0 googledoc-extract-images-lin googledoc-extract-images; rm -r googledoc-extract-images
scripts.win-package: cd build; rm -r googledoc-extract-images; cp -r googledoc-extract-images-win32-x64 googledoc-extract-images; 7z a -ssw -mx5 -spf -r0 googledoc-extract-images-win googledoc-extract-images; rm -r googledoc-extract-images

author: Marat Talipov
